00034 #ifndef _PLT_MEDIA_CONNECT_H_
00035 #define _PLT_MEDIA_CONNECT_H_
00036 
00037 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 |       includes
00039 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00040 #include "Neptune.h"
00041 #include "PltFileMediaServer.h"
00042 
00043 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 |   PLT_MediaConnectInfo
00045 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 class PLT_MediaConnectInfo
00047 {
00048 public:
00049     PLT_MediaConnectInfo(bool authorized = false) : 
00050         m_Authorized(authorized), m_Validated(false) {}
00051 
00052     bool       m_Authorized;
00053     bool       m_Validated;
00054     NPT_String m_UDN;
00055 };
00056 
00057 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 |   defines
00059 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00060 typedef NPT_Map<NPT_String, PLT_MediaConnectInfo>        PLT_MediaConnectDeviceInfoMap;
00061 typedef NPT_Map<NPT_String, PLT_MediaConnectInfo>::Entry PLT_MediaConnectDeviceInfoMapEntry;
00062 typedef NPT_Map<NPT_String, NPT_String>                  PLT_UDNtoMACMap;
00063 typedef NPT_Map<NPT_String, NPT_String>::Entry           PLT_UDNtoMACMapEntry;
00064 
00065 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00066 |   PLT_MediaConnect
00067 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00068 class PLT_MediaConnect : public PLT_MediaServer
00069 {
00070 public:
00071     // class methods
00072     static NPT_Result GetMappedObjectId(const char* object_id, 
00073                                         NPT_String& mapped_object_id);
00074     
00075     // constructor
00076     PLT_MediaConnect(const char*  friendly_name,
00077                      bool         show_ip = false,
00078                      const char*  udn = NULL,
00079                      NPT_UInt16   port = 0,
00080                      bool         port_rebind = false);
00081 
00082     // methods
00083     NPT_Result Authorize(PLT_MediaConnectInfo* info, bool state);
00084     NPT_Result Validate(PLT_MediaConnectInfo* info, bool state);
00085 
00086 protected:
00087     virtual ~PLT_MediaConnect();
00088     
00089     // PLT_DeviceHost methods
00090     virtual NPT_Result SetupServices();
00091     virtual NPT_Result OnAction(PLT_ActionReference&          action, 
00092                                 const PLT_HttpRequestContext& context);
00093     virtual NPT_Result ProcessGetDescription(NPT_HttpRequest&              request,
00094                                              const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context,
00095                                              NPT_HttpResponse&             response);
00096 
00097     // X_MS_MediaReceiverRegistrar
00098     virtual NPT_Result OnIsAuthorized(PLT_ActionReference&  action, 
00099                                       PLT_MediaConnectInfo* mediaConnectInfo);
00100     virtual NPT_Result OnRegisterDevice(PLT_ActionReference&  action, 
00101                                         PLT_MediaConnectInfo* mediaConnectInfo);
00102     virtual NPT_Result OnIsValidated(PLT_ActionReference&  action, 
00103                                      PLT_MediaConnectInfo* mediaConnectInfo);
00104 
00105 private:
00106     NPT_Result LookUpMediaConnectInfo(NPT_String             deviceID, 
00107                                       PLT_MediaConnectInfo*& mediaConnectInfo);
00108 
00109 protected:
00110     PLT_MediaConnectDeviceInfoMap m_MediaConnectDeviceInfoMap;
00111     PLT_UDNtoMACMap               m_MediaConnectUDNMap;
00112     PLT_Service*                  m_RegistrarService;
00113 };
00114 
00115 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00116  |   PLT_FileMediaConnectDelegate class
00117  +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00118 class PLT_FileMediaConnectDelegate : public PLT_FileMediaServerDelegate
00119 {
00120 public:
00121     // constructor & destructor
00122     PLT_FileMediaConnectDelegate(const char* url_root, const char* file_root) :
00123         PLT_FileMediaServerDelegate(url_root, file_root) {}
00124     virtual ~PLT_FileMediaConnectDelegate() {}
00125     
00126     // PLT_FileMediaServerDelegate methods
00127     virtual NPT_Result GetFilePath(const char* object_id, NPT_String& filepath);
00128 };
